original_title: That Englishwoman: An Account of the Life of Emily Hobhouse
overview: Dirk de Villiers -An English woman dares to defy the might of the British Empire and champions the cause of the Boers during the Anglo-Boer War, battling to alleviate the suffering of women and children in concentration camps.  - Veronica Lang, Terence Alexander, Jenny Runacre
title: That Englishwoman: An Account of the Life of Emily Hobhouse
